It is well-known that the large π-conjugated (B 3O 6) 3– group is a source of excellent NLO properties in materials like the famous crystal β-BaB 2O 4 (BBO).
35, 36 Owing to structural similarity, the cyanurate group (C 3N 3O 3) 3– is a good candidate for the substation of the (B 3O 6) 3– group. In addition, hydro-isocyanurate (HC 3N 3O 3) 2–, dihydro-isocyanurate (H 2C 3N 3O 3) − were synthesized via a more easy crystal synthesis method compared to none hydrogen bonding cyanurates.
37, 38 Ye’s group reported KLi(HC 3N 3O 3)·2H 2O with a large second harmonic generation (SHG) response that was 5.3 times that of KH 2PO 4 (KDP), and Lin’s group calculated the birefringence of Cs 3Na(H 2C 3N 3O 3) 4·3H 2O with the value of 0.29 in ab principle plane at 514 nm.
39, 40 During our manuscript preparation, five compounds in the isohydro- and dihydro-cyanurates family including the title compound have been reported.
